# Tapa... IN SPAAAAACE

This is a [Tapa](https://puzz.link/rules.html?tapa) variant - in addition to regular Tapa rules, each row and column must have exactly one Black Hole, which counts for 2 for Tapa clues, and two stars which follow [Star Battle](https://puzz.link/rules.html?starbattle) rules. The Black Holes and Stars must be on the Tapa wall.


Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2023/tapaInSpaaaaace1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
